name: 2nd Edition of International Conference on Veterinary Science
content: We are delighted to invite researchers, practitioners, and experts in animal health and veterinary medicine to join us at the "2nd Edition of International Conference on Veterinary Science" (VET 2025), set to take place as a Hybrid Event from June 9-11, 2025, in Rome, Italy. Under the theme “Enhancing Animal Health: Innovations and Challenges in Veterinary Care” this conference will spotlight cutting-edge advancements and novel solutions in veterinary science. Attendees can look forward to a rich program featuring keynote speeches, symposiums, and oral and poster presentations, all curated by a distinguished Editorial Board comprising researchers, scientists, veterinary practitioners, and industry professionals. This global Veterinary Science Conferences 2025 promises a comprehensive exploration of current and future technologies aimed at improving animal health and welfare. Animal Science Conferences 2025 is the perfect platform for fostering new collaborations, expanding professional networks, and gaining insights from leading experts worldwide. Join us in shaping the future of veterinary medicine and enhancing the lives of animals everywhere.
